author: jking79
body:
Updated ParameterDescription in EcalUncalibRecHitWorkerMultiFit.cc to show crossCorrelationMethod parameters

#### PR description:

ParameterDescription in EcalUncalibRecHitWorkerMultiFit.cc was not updated to reflect transition to crossCorrelationMethod as default ECAL rechit time reconstruction.  ParameterDescription where updated.
title: Updated ParameterDescription in EcalUncalibRecHitWorkerMultiFit.cc
